channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Mark and Lauren get the help of experts to design dream dens for children. Nyobi loves to be creative and spends hours working on her art and design projects. However Nyobi needs more room, a proper desk space and better art materials in order to fully 'express herself'! Also, her tendency to splash paint on her bedroom carpet, in their rented accommodation, is causing some problems for Nyobi and her mum.
